title: Lectern space

properties.name: description
properties.value: Lectern space is a hotspot in the Study of a player-owned house that is only visible to the player when in building mode.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Lectern space
Lectern space
Released31 May 2006 (Update)
MembersYes
QuestNo
LocationPlayer-owned house (study)
OptionsBuild
ExamineYou can build a spellbook stand here.
Advanced data
Object ID15420

Lectern space is a hotspot in the Study of a player-owned house that is only visible to the player when in building mode.

Uses[edit | edit source]

Item Use
Oak lectern Creates the following Magic tablets:

Enchant sapphire or opal
Varrock teleport

Eagle lectern Creates the following Magic tablets:

Enchant sapphire or opal
Varrock teleport
Falador teleport
Lumbridge teleport

Demon lectern Creates the following Magic tablets:

Enchant sapphire or opal
Enchant emerald or jade
Varrock teleport
Bones to bananas

Teak eagle lectern Creates the following Magic tablets:

Enchant sapphire or opal
Varrock teleport
Falador teleport
Lumbridge teleport
Camelot teleport
Ardougne teleport

Teak demon lectern Creates the following Magic tablets:

Enchant sapphire or opal
Enchant emerald or jade
Enchant ruby or topaz
Enchant diamond
Varrock teleport
Bones to bananas

Mahogany eagle lectern Creates the following Magic tablets:

Enchant sapphire or opal
Varrock teleport
Falador teleport
Lumbridge teleport
Camelot teleport
Ardougne teleport
Watchtower teleport
Teleport to house

Mahogany demon lectern Creates the following Magic tablets:

Enchant sapphire or opal
Enchant emerald or jade
Enchant ruby or topaz
Enchant diamond
Enchant dragonstone
Enchant onyx
Varrock teleport
Bones to bananas
Bones to peaches

Marble lectern Players can create all standard magic tablets.

Key[1] Level Lectern Materials Experience Cost

6 67 Mahogany eagle lectern Mahogany plank x2
Gold leaf x1 		580 138,722

Gold leaf x1 		580 138,722
8 77 Marble lectern Marble block
Magic stone
Gold leaf 		1,800 1,460,596
